page.title: 20CREDITS PAGE.
page.content: { }THE WORK TO COMPLETE THIS {DOMESDAY}ENTRY WAS DONE IN MAY AND JUNE 1985 BY THE PUPILS AND STAFF OF {PLOCKTON PRIMARY SCHOOL.} TEXT WRITTEN BY CLASSES 4 TO 7 ARE PAGES 3 TO 5,AND 8 TO 17.THE WRITERS WERE CLASS 4.{KATIE BROWN.} CLASS 5.{PAUL FINLAYSON.} { DAVID SMITH. { SHEILA TAYLOR.} CLASS 7.{KAREN INCH. { RUTH McANDREW. { THOMAS MacLENNAN. { MAIRI MacKENZIE. { RODERICK MITCHELL. } PAGES 6 AND 7 WERE COMPILED BY{ {CATRIONA LAING}WITH THE HELP OF HER INFANT CLASSES.THE REST OF THE TEXT WAS WRITTEN BY{COLIN McANDREW,}WHO WITH{J.D.FINLAYSON,}TOOK THE PHOTOGRAPHS USED.
